credit_line: Gift of Mary S.M. Gibson in memory of her sister, Margaret Jane Gibson
title: Cup and saucer
description: Extremely thin, transparent white body moulded in ridges resembling a scallop shell. Relief decoration in green and gold.  On cup, a bunch of leaves and a butterfly, on saucer a thistle plant.  Marked "BELLEEK" in rust brown on cup and saucer.
name: Cup and saucer
